slides.title: Sample Presentation Title
slides.subtitle: A Demonstration of Various Slide Types

slides.title: Understanding Text Slides
slides.content:
This is an example of a **text slide**. It's useful for providing detailed explanations, introductions, or summaries. You can include *formatted text*, paragraphs, and even [links](http://example.com).

Further content can be added here to elaborate on the topic.

slides.title: Sample Data Table
slides.content: Tables are excellent for presenting structured data. This example shows a simple comparison.

slides.title: Radar Chart Example
slides.content: Visualizing multi-dimensional data points for comparison. (Sample data is internally generated by the component for this demo).

slides.title: Word Cloud Demonstration
slides.content: Highlighting key themes or terms. (Sample data is internally generated by the component for this demo).

slides.title: Predictive Tool Showcase
slides.content: An example of an interactive tool embedded within a slide. Adjust the sliders to see a simulated prediction.

slides.title: End of Sample Deck
slides.content: Thank you for viewing this sample Aigora presentation.
